title: uLLam eandil
sahitya:
uLLam enadil bhakti veLLam enap-peruga vaLLi maNALanE karuNai koLvAi enpAl


anupallavi

  allal urum aDiyAr anudinam unniDam sholli varum tollai ellAm ozhippOnE


caraNam    cennai nagarattai shirakka sheyyum kanda kOTTa manrattil irukkum enran kandavELE
munnai vinai onrum ennai ini enrum tunburuttAdirukka un padam paNindEn
